Philip Polkinghorne murder trial: Crown begins day-long closing address https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/philip-polkinghorne-murder-trial-crown-begins-day-long-fitting-address/CBKNP2V2DBDI7D4SR2DJ5HR5JI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/philip-polkinghorne-murder-trial-crown-begins-day-long-fitting-address/CBKNP2V2DBDI7D4SR2DJ5HR5JI/ Craig KapitanThe surgeon is accused of having strangled wife Pauline Hanna before staging a suicide. Mon, 16 Sep 2024 02:11:13 +0000 The Crown delivers the closing address in the murder trial of Philip Polkinghorne, accused of killing wife Pauline Hanna. Photos / Michael Craig
Thunderstorms, heavy rain, small tornadoes to lash the country, Aucklanders told to ‘be prepared’ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/thunderstorms-heavy-rain-small-tornadoes-to-lash-the-country-temporals-to-plunge/RN32QDSIKBDE3OKOPS3JI4CIDU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/thunderstorms-heavy-rain-small-tornadoes-to-lash-the-country-temporals-to-plunge/RN32QDSIKBDE3OKOPS3JI4CIDU/ A wintry blast will envelop most regions, with the worst to hit Auckland at 6pm. Sun, 15 Sep 2024 20:03:00 +0000 Qually showers & thunderstorms are expected this afternoon & evening. Photo / NIWA
Gangs Bill: Why a new move banning gang patches in a private home is causing an uproar https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/gangs-bill-why-a-new-move-banning-gang-patches-in-a-private-home-is-causing-an-uproar/ 6ZQFUWYKAZFLLLSXVGN2TLPBJY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/gangs-bill-why-a-new-move-banning-gang-patches-in-a-private-home-is-causing-an-uproar/ 6ZQFUWYKAZFLLLSXVGN2TLPBJY/ Derek ChengShould it be a jailable crime to have a gang patch in your house, even if it's not yours? Sun, 15 Sep 2024 17:00:00 +0000 A new clause in the Government's Gangs Bill will mean repeat offenders of the ban of gang patches in public places will be put under a "gang insignia prohibition order", meaning they won't be allowed a gang patch in their home for five years. Photo / Duncan Brown

Nurse Maude patient suffers life-threatening complications after catheter goes unchanged for four months, medication not monitored https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/patent-suffers-life-throne-complications-after-catheter-goes-unchanged-for-four-months-medication-not-monitored/JJNCZNMZUFFNJF32S6QQQCQZRU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/patent-suffers-life-throne-complications-after-catheter-goes-unchanged-for-four-months-medication-not-monitored/JJNCZNMZUFFNJF32S6QQQCQZRU/ Isaac DavisonThe home care company, Nurse Maude, has been told to apologise and make changes.
